onCreateCommand: bash -lc 'sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends openjdk-21-jdk curl ca-certificates && sudo apt-get clean && sudo rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* && curl -LsSf https://astral.sh/uv/install.sh | sh && export PATH=$PATH:/home/vscode/.local/bin && uv tool update-shell && uv python install 3.11'
postCreateCommand: bash -lc 'export PATH=/home/vscode/.local/bin:$PATH && java -version && javac -version && node -v && npm -v && uv --version && uv python list && python3.11 -V'
